example.code:
PS C:\> Get-ASAutoScalingGroup | format-table -property AutoScalingGroupName
AutoScalingGroupName -------------------- my-asg-1 my-asg-2 my-asg-3 my-asg-4 my-asg-5 my-asg-6
example.description: This example lists the names of your Auto Scaling groups.
This example describes the specified Auto Scaling group.
This example describes the specified two Auto Scaling groups.
This example describes the Auto Scaling instances for the specified Auto Scaling group.
This example describes all your Auto Scaling groups.
This example describes all your Auto Scaling groups, in batches of 10.

example.code:
PS C:\> (Get-ASAutoScalingGroup -AutoScalingGroupName my-ag-1).LaunchTemplate
LaunchTemplateId LaunchTemplateName Version ---------------- ------------------ ------- lt-06095fd619cb40371 test-launch-template $Default
example.description: This example describes LaunchTemplate for the specified Auto Scaling group. This example assumes that the "Instance purchase options" is set to "Adhere to launch template". In case this option is set to "Combine purchase options and instance types", LaunchTemplate could be accessed using "MixedInstancesPolicy.LaunchTemplate" property.
